description: Avoma is an AI Meeting Assistant that automatically records, transcribes, and summarizes your meetings.

actions.name: create_call
actions.description: Creates a new call in Avoma

actions.name: get_meeting_recording
actions.description: Returns video and audio recording URLs for a given meeting

actions.name: get_meeting_transcription
actions.description: Returns transcription with speakers, timestamps, and VTT file URL

triggers.name: meeting_cancelled
triggers.description: Triggers when a meeting booked via the scheduling page is cancelled

triggers.name: meeting_rescheduled
triggers.description: Triggers when a scheduled meeting is rescheduled

triggers.name: new_meeting_scheduled
triggers.description: Triggers when a meeting is booked via one of your Avoma scheduling pages

triggers.name: new_note
triggers.description: Triggers when notes are successfully generated for meetings or calls
